name: Log your Android location in SeaTable
description:
Every time you enter/leave a circle specified in your Make Android app, it will be logged in SeaTable. You can use SeaTable's mapblock to visualize your locations.
The Seatable used in this scenario has the following columns: Created, Circle name, Latitude, Longitude, Altitude, Entering, Leaving. Without them, it will not be possible to succesfully finish building the scenario.
